member.name: T:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard
member.summary: The AbstractWizard type provides an abstract base class implementation containing common, reusable methods for implementing Visual Studio custom project template Wizard classes.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.VarSolutionDir
member.summary: Defines the template variable name for the solution directory.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.VarWizardData
member.summary: Defines the template variable name for the wizard data.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.VarDestinationDir
member.summary: Defines the template variable name for the destination directory.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.VarSafeProjectName
member.summary: Defines the template variable name for the safe project name.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.TemplatePackageExt
member.summary: Defines the file extension for a Visual Studio template package.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.Ns
member.summary: Defines the namespace used for wizard template data XML.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the AbstractWizard class.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.Validate
member.summary: Defines an abstract method for validating creation of a Visual Studio project using a project template from a Wizard class implementation.
member.returns: A value indicating if the project template is valid.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.RunStarted(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.WizardRunKind,System.Object[])
member.summary: Defines an abstract base method that sets common properties when a Wizard implementation's RunStarted method is executed.
member.param: A reference to the automation object used by the Visual Studio project template wizard.
A reference to a dictionary of template variables that can be modified to provide customization.
Defines the type of the template the template wizard is creating.
An array of custom parameters passed to the template wizard.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.GetWizardData(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets a dictionary containing data for the template wizard using data parsed from the specified replacements dictionary.
member.param: A reference to a dictionary of template variables that can be modified to provide customization.
member.returns: A dictionary containing data for the template wizard.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.VsUtils
member.summary: Gets a reference to the Visual Studio utilities.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.SolutionRoot
member.summary: Gets directory information for the Visual Studio solution root.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.WizardData
member.summary: Gets a dictionary containing data for the template wizard.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.TemplatePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the Visual Studio project template.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.DefaultDestinationPath
member.summary: Gets the default destination path of the Visual Studio project to be created.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.NameSpace
member.summary: Gets the namespace for the Visual Studio project to be created.

member.name: P:OpenLib.VsWizards.AbstractWizard.IsValid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the project template is valid.

member.name: T:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard
member.summary: The FolderWizard type provides an implementation of the IWizard interface that provides a custom Visual Studio project template wizard for overriding the default behavior of where physical project folders are created.
member.remarks: This class inherits from AbstractWizard, which provides common Wizard properties and methods.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.WizardDataKeyTemplate
member.summary: Defines the wizard data dictionary key for the project template.

member.name: F:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.WizardDataKeySolutionFolder
member.summary: Defines the wizard data dictionary key for the solution folder.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the FolderWizard class.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.Validate
member.summary: Validates the creation of a Visual Studio project using a project template from this Wizard class implementation.
member.returns: A value indicating if the project template is valid.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.BeforeOpeningFile(EnvDTE.ProjectItem)
member.summary: Executes before each file that is being added to a Visual Studio project is opened.
member.param: A reference to the project item being added to the Visual Studio project.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.ProjectFinishedGenerating(EnvDTE.Project)
member.summary: Executes when a Visual Studio project is being created.
member.param: A reference to the Visual Studio project being created.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.ProjectItemFinishedGenerating(EnvDTE.ProjectItem)
member.summary: Executes when a Visual Studio project item is created.
member.param: A reference to the project item created in the Visual Studio project.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.RunFinished
member.summary: Executes when the creation of a Visual Studio project is complete.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.ShouldAddProjectItem(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if a project item should be added to a Visual Studio project.
member.param: The absolute path to the project item being added.
member.returns: A value indicating if a project item should be added.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.RunStarted(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},Microsoft.VisualStudio.TemplateWizard.WizardRunKind,System.Object[])
member.summary: Executes when the creation of a Visual Studio project is started.
member.param: A reference to the automation object used by the Visual Studio project template wizard.
A reference to a dictionary of template variables that can be modified to provide customization.
Defines the type of the template the template wizard is creating.
An array of custom parameters passed to the template wizard.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.AddProject(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a Visual Studio project to a solution folder using the specified wizard data and to an overriden physical folder on the file system.
member.param: Directory information for the Visual Studio solution root.
A dictionary containing data for the template wizard.
The path to the Visual Studio project template.
The default destination path of the Visual Studio project to be created.
The namespace for the Visual Studio project to be created.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.FolderWizard.StripSolutionPath(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Strips an extra directory out of the specified solution path to override the default Visual Studio project folder's location on the file system.
member.param: The current path to the Visual Studio solution.
The name of the Visual Studio solution directory.
member.returns: The updated solution path with the extra directory stripped out.

member.name: T:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionCleanUpWizard
member.summary: The SolutionCleanUpWizard type provides an implementation of the IWizard interface that provides a custom Visual Studio project template wizard for cleaning up Visual Studio solution and project directories after a solution is created.
member.remarks: This class inherits from AbstractWizard, which provides common Wizard properties and methods.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the SolutionCleanUpWizard class.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionCleanUpWizard.Validate
member.summary: Validates the creation of a Visual Studio project using a project template from this Wizard class implementation.

member.summary: Executes before each file that is being added to a Visual Studio project is opened.

member.summary: Executes when a Visual Studio project is being created.
member.param: A reference to the Visual Studio project being created.

member.summary: Executes when a Visual Studio project item is created.
member.param: A reference to the project item created in the Visual Studio project.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionCleanUpWizard.RunFinished
member.summary: Executes when the creation of a Visual Studio project is complete.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating if a project item should be added to a Visual Studio project.
member.param: The absolute path to the project item being added.
member.returns: A value indicating if a project item should be added.

member.summary: Executes when the creation of a Visual Studio project is started.
member.param: A reference to the automation object used by the Visual Studio project template wizard.
A reference to a dictionary of template variables that can be modified to provide customization.
Defines the type of the template the template wizard is creating.
An array of custom parameters passed to the template wizard.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionCleanUpWizard.CleanSolution(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Cleans up Visual Studio solution and project directories.
member.param: Directory information for the Visual Studio solution root.

member.name: T:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionItemsWizard
member.summary: The SolutionItemsWizard type provides an implementation of the IWizard interface that provides a custom Visual Studio project template wizard for adding solution items to a Visual Studio solution.
member.remarks: This class inherits from AbstractWizard, which provides common Wizard properties and methods.

member.summary: Defines the wizard data dictionary key for the solution items.

member.summary: Defines the physical Visual Studio solution root.

member.summary: Validates the creation of a Visual Studio project using a project template from this Wizard class implementation.

member.summary: Executes before each file that is being added to a Visual Studio project is opened.

member.summary: Executes when the creation of a Visual Studio project is started.
member.param: A reference to the automation object used by the Visual Studio project template wizard.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionItemsWizard.GetSolutionItems(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets a list of all solution items to be added to a Visual Studio solution.
member.param: A dictionary containing data for the template wizard.
member.returns: A list of all solution items to be added to a Visual Studio solution.
member.remarks: Each list item is stored as a Tuple: Item1 = Physical folder Item2 = Solution folder Item3 = Solution item file

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionItemsWizard.AddSolutionItems(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Tuple{System.String,System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Adds Visual Studio solution items to solution folders using the specified solution item metadata and creates the files in their appropriate physical folders on the file system.
member.param: Directory information for the Visual Studio solution root.
The path to the Visual Studio project template.
A list of metadata for creation of the solution items.

member.name: M:OpenLib.VsWizards.SolutionItemsWizard.GetSafePath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a safe path by removing invalid path characters.
member.param: The path in which to cleanse of invalid characters.
member.returns: A safe path by removing invalid path characters.
